alert.note: Alert for Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:37PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Sanilac County through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Deckerville to Argyle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deckerville around 240 PM EDT. Forestville around 310 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Tyre, Minden, Palms, Richmondville and McGregor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
